title: Elementary Mathematics and Science Equipment Act
content: Elementary Mathematics and Science Equipment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to allot funds to State educational agencies to award grants to local educational agencies to provide hands-on instruction equipment and materials to elementary schools to improve mathematics and science education. Authorizes appropriations. Sets forth requirements for: (1) State allotments, (2) State and local applications, (3) grant award priorities, (4) participation of private schools, (5) State and Federal responsibilities. And (6) limitation on use of grant funds only for science equipment or materials and mathematical manipulative materials necessary for hands-on instruction.
